hits.title: Ask HN: Anyone built on top of Companies House API? Rate limiting is brutal
hits.story_text: We're building a due-diligence tool using Companies House data. The 600-req/5-min cap is killing us for batch jobs. Has anyone found a workaround short of spinning up proxies?
hits.author: devfounder42
